name: Bangor The Game! Operation Opiate Opposition
name_original: Bangor The Game! Operation Opiate Opposition
description:
THIS IS THE MUCH ANTICIPATED DEMO VERSION (BETA RELEASE)

Bangor The Game is a unique and fun RPG based on Bangor, Maine USA! Travel around Bangor and fights villains and junkies while amassing cash and winning awards!

Features

  • Playable Casino
  • Local Hospital
  • Many Varied Shops
  • Awards
  • Purchase a Bicycle, Car and More!
  • Call a cab or take the City Bus!

Hours of fun, still in development. So leave us feedback on how we can improve the game!
